website_summaries.verdict: Very basic looking door sweep, but it will do the job of cutting down on drafts at a low price.
pros: Sturdy metal frame ensures that this door sweep will give you a good level of longevity
Protects against drafts or insects entering your home or building
You'll be able to install this door sweep relatively quickly
Includes a vinyl rubber product on the door sweep, which you easily can trim to fit
cons: Holes in the rubber vinyl strip don't always line up perfectly with the metal frame

customer_reviews.title: Nice solution for under door gap.
customer_reviews.text: I installed this product in about 10 minutes. It looks great and solved the problem I had. Seems more black than brown, but I am fine with that. Comes with 4 screws, not the 7 pictured . . . but you only need 4 screws, so again, not a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlyn Williams

customer_reviews.title: This is definitely what the doctor ordered...
customer_reviews.text: Why didn't I order this product sooner? It keeps in and everything out. Here in TX those pesky geckos try to get inside which I'm deathly afraid of. The hard rubber (or maybe its plastic) does its job and it does break or crack. Be sure to check the thresholds in your doorways and the amount of space between your door and it. Do a 'test run' by taping this unit to your door and open and close your door. This will give you an indication of whether you will need to adjust it (higher or lower) to your taste and/or liking. You might need to cut this unit to size as well using a sharp knife, saw, etc.
customer_reviews.author: TwoBold4Ya1990

customer_reviews.title: Quick and effective, durable too
customer_reviews.text: Installed easily to inside of "swing-in" door about 2-3 months ago. Worked well to reduce draft when sealed up against wood threshold Draft was eliminated in all areas this covered. Additional weatherstripping is needed in corners of old door to help, but this effectively stopped all the air blowing under the door. I installed with just a small amount of "flex" or interference to allow the door to close without too much more force. Build quality is good, came with matched screws to install. I cut metal with a hacksaw to fit door, and poked holes (with drill) through rubber for screws before installing.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew W

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, easy to install, does the job
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so the flexible vinyl rubber part does require a tiny bit of trimming, but you can actually do that easily with a pair of scissors (it won't be as nice or clean a cut as with a knife, but it's on the floor where no one will notice). Installation into my wooden door was extremely simple and only required I screw it into place. It does the job, looks seamless, and I doubt anyone will even realize something is different about the door.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Youn

customer_reviews.title: Well made and works.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be well constructed from quality materials. Needed a hacksaw (too thick for metal snips) to cut the metal to length on the both sides so that the screw holes can be centered on the door. Comes with everything (4 screws, not the 7 that are shown). Forms a good seal with metal bottom plate of my door frame. You do have to drive screws into the door to install the sweep.
customer_reviews.author: A.Lau

customer_reviews.title: does the job
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty straight forward and well made door sweep. It comes with a rubber piece that is longer so you can cut it down to size. I suggest holding it in position of where you want it to be and place your drill bit through the pre done holes and drill into your door. This will allow for easy installation to your door and will insure you have it in the exact spot you want and avoid stripping the the screw heads
customer_reviews.author: B. Collins

customer_reviews.title: Height adjustment not easy.
customer_reviews.text: The product looks good and does it job and was exactly what I was looking for. My only con is that the holes on the rubber are not height adjustable like the metal strip. This made the job of making height adjustments time consuming and a bit messy. THIS SEEMS LIKE AN ESAY FIX FOR THE MFG. Gary
customer_reviews.author: Gary in AZ

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy door seal
customer_reviews.text: This simple to cut (to size) door seal attaches easily and quickly. I used a mitre box and saw. Placed on a garage exterior side door without a jamb, and a 3/4” to 1” space at the bottom, the seal does what we had hoped it would do — stop mice from entering the garage.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Great, sturdy weatherstrip
customer_reviews.text: Great, sturdy weatherstrip. I installed it on my basement cellar door to keep out dirt and insects. I used a dremel cutting wheel to cut mine back a few inches.
customer_reviews.author: jeffreyandrew

customer_reviews.title: Poor finish quality
customer_reviews.text: ORB Finish was bubbled and peeling after 2 days in the rain
customer_reviews.author: mkennedy2000

customer_reviews.title: Worked great! I know that is not really the intention ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to try to stifle some noise from my apartment to the adjoining hallway. Worked great! I know that is not really the intention of the product but it added a layer of insulation at the base of the door. Glad I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle K.

customer_reviews.title: poorly made
customer_reviews.text: Did not weather well at all started pealing after a few rain episodes...already attached can't send back or I would have
customer_reviews.author: whispy

customer_reviews.title: Did what i needed it to do
customer_reviews.text: Cut and install. Works great. The rubber sweeper seems pretty stout like it should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Efren Pelayo Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, and easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: A couple of bucks cheaper here than Home Depot or Lowe's. Easy to installs, and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: HY

customer_reviews.title: Works well and looks nice.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to trim and a brown magic marker hides the edges well. It is on an entry door and looks a lot better than I thought it would.
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice sweep. Rubber part is just stiff enough, but also limber enough. Really like it.
customer_reviews.author: My Review

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: I put this on the outside of my apartment door to ensure that no insects or other varmints enter my apartment underneath the door. It looks great and does the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Onyx girl

customer_reviews.title: Much better than the big box store product but not as ...
customer_reviews.text: Much better than the big box store product but not as thick as my original. The best I could find on the market though. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: StevenSanDiego

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived as described and in perfect condition. Easy to install on screen door.
customer_reviews.author: CF

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I used the door sweep at the bottom of an out-swinging wood screen door to keep the bugs out. It works just fine but does not completely seal the sides adjacent to the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Home James

customer_reviews.title: DON’T BUY THIS PRODUCT, PAINT PEELED OFF IN A YEAR
customer_reviews.text: Pure junk! Paint peeling after a year. Certainly not a good product
customer_reviews.author: Barry Seidel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for my business. Priced about right. Will keep using them on new jobs and they last forever.
customer_reviews.author: TRXFord

customer_reviews.title: good quality strong too
customer_reviews.text: works well, good quality strong too. delivery was fast too.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product was easy to set up and looks really clean after installed
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Sealed the gap under our door perfectly and saves us money on heating and air
customer_reviews.text: This did the trick to seal the gaping 1/2" gap beneath our poorly-hung exterior French doors on our old house. Now the bitter cold draft and the hot summer heat no longer leaks in and out wasting electricity. It was tall enough for our project to be adjustable to seal off the whole draft and came with all hardware. You do have to drill small pilot holes. The oil rubbed bronze color was very true to our door trim and the rubber is thick but flexible. Perfect
customer_reviews.author: CareinaCareina

customer_reviews.title: Product different than pictured/described
customer_reviews.text: The product that was delivered was not the same as the product pictured and described. Instead of being "bronze" in color, it was a golden brown with a fake wood grain and the packaging indicated it was "oak/roble." Unfortunately, this will not match with my door.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Didn't come with screws
customer_reviews.text: Quality of product was good but screws were not included as stated.
customer_reviews.author: kim lutz

customer_reviews.title: work good
customer_reviews.text: They are a little bigger than we thought they would be, but work good. Installed easy. Keep the rain and pests out.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Kasten

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Did the job/a quality product. I needed some extra screws so I called the company.....got service with a smile!
customer_reviews.author: Donald D. Ward

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect
customer_reviews.text: Easy to replace, just remove screws from old one and put his one in.
customer_reviews.author: S. Haynes

product_meta.title: M-D Building Products 68254 1-1/4-Inch EPDM 36-Inch DB006 Commercial Grade Door Sweep, Brown/Marron
feature_bullets: Seals gaps up to 3/4-Inch high between bottom of door and threshold

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
